docs.snippet: Venezuelan President Nicolas Maduro said on Friday four people had been held following another rowdy anti-government protest, the latest in a spate of sporadic street demonstrations being fanned by hardline opposition parties....
docs.lead_paragraph: Venezuelan President Nicolas Maduro said on Friday four people had been held following another rowdy anti-government protest, the latest in a spate of sporadic street demonstrations being fanned by hardline opposition parties.

headline.main: Venezuela Says Four More Held Over Anti-Maduro Protests
headline.print_headline: Venezuela Says Four More Held Over Anti-Maduro Protests

docs.snippet: Some of the world's biggest drugmakers are playing a larger role in anti-doping efforts at this year's Winter Olympics: They're providing information on drugs that once would have been considered proprietary trade secrets....
docs.lead_paragraph: Some of the world's biggest drugmakers are playing a larger role in anti-doping efforts at this year's Winter Olympics: They're providing information on drugs that once would have been considered proprietary trade secrets.

headline.main: Pharma Data Play Larger Role in Olympic Drug Tests
headline.print_headline: Pharma Data Play Larger Role in Olympic Drug Tests

docs.snippet: David Wildstein is now the wild card in the scandal surrounding Gov. Chris Christie and the revenge-closings of lanes leading to the George Washington Bridge in September....
docs.lead_paragraph: David Wildstein is now the wild card in the scandal surrounding Gov. Chris Christie and the revenge-closings of lanes leading to the George Washington Bridge in September.
docs.abstract: Former Port Authority official David Wildstein is now the wild card in scandal surrounding New Jersey Gov Chris Christie and the revenge-closings of lanes leading to the George Washington Bridge in September 2013; on his blog, ex-ally to Christie showed his approach to politics and much about his motivations and strategy now.

headline.main: On Blog, an Ex-Christie Ally Showed Approach to Politics
headline.print_headline: On Blog, an Ex-Christie Ally Showed Approach to Politics
